    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vreme</string>
            <string language="en">Weather</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wetter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Survivez à</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καιρός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tiempo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Predstavitev je namenjena samostojnemu delu posameznika. Na prvi strani so navodila. Po končani predstavitvi lahko preverimo znanje s kvizom, iz katerega se lahko znova vračamo na prosojnico.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of weather - seasons, precipitation (rain, snow, ...), sun, wind, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vreme</string>
            <string language="en">weather</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sneg</string>
            <string language="en">snow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sonce</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">veter</string>
            <string language="en">wind</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung des Wetters - Jahreszeiten, 
Niederschlag (Regen, Schnee...), Sonne, Wind...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La présentation de survivent à - à des 
saisons, précipitation (pluie, neige...), soleil, vent...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação do tempo - estações, 
precipitação (chuva, neve...), sol, vento...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione di tempo - stagioni, precipitazione
(pioggia, neve...), sole, vento...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση του καιρού - εποχές, πτώση (βροχή, 
χιόνι...), ήλιος, αέρας...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación del tiempo - estaciones, 
precipitación (lluvia, nieve...), sol, viento...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wetter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schnee</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wind</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">survivez à</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
